Title: Staff Data Analyst
RoleDescription:
MongoDBs mission is to empower innovators to create, transform, and disrupt industries by unleashing the power of software and data. We enable organizations of all sizes to easily build, scale, and run modern applications by helping them modernize legacy workloads, embrace innovation, and unleash AI. Our industry-leading developer data platform, MongoDB Atlas, is the only globally distributed, multi-cloud database and is available in more than 115 regions across AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. Atlas allows customers to build and run applications anywhereon premises, or across cloud providers. With offices worldwide and over 175,000 new developers signing up to use MongoDB every month, its no wonder that leading organizations, like Samsung and Toyota, trust MongoDB to build next-generation, AI-powered applications.
This staff analyst will join our analytics org within the Executive Insights team, which is responsible for synthesizing revenue and operational data from across the company to measure the trajectory and overall health of the business. Visualizations, insights and root cause analyses generated by this team routinely empower MongoDBs executive team to make data-informed decisions.
You will work closely with partner teams in analytics, sales operations, cloud billing, and FP&A in order to not only drive alignment on business performance narratives, but also to drive company wide transparency and data democratization for critical business metrics.

Act as the subject matter expert at the company for revenue analysis, and as the business logic owner for how internal revenue metrics are calculated
Leverage technical skill set to build data products and drive automations that vastly improve our capabilities for root cause analysis of revenue changes
Stitch together various sources of performance metrics from across the company into golden revenue data sets that can be leveraged across the company
Build best in class analytics products that enable self service insights to critical company metrics
Work with partner teams to break down analysis silos via the creation of shared data assets and to ensure consistency with performance narratives across the company
Provide mentorship and guidance on best practices to junior team members

Skills & Attributes

Passionate about using data to help guide strategic decision making
Experienced at telling stories with data and communicating to stakeholders at all levels of the business
Fluent in at least one scripting language, with a preference for Python
Experienced in engineering data pipelines and ETL in languages like SQL and workflow orchestration tools like Apache Airflow
Experienced in building strong relationships with stakeholders and colleagues to tackle big, cross-functional problems
Comfortable working with executive stakeholders who need your expertise to guide their thinking
A strong product thinker with good product sense: you know how to get at what our partners need and how to develop solutions to satisfy those needs
An exceptional communicator with both technical and non-technical audiences
Comfortable with ambiguity, and thrive with minimal oversight and process
